name: gold reserve
query:
SELECT
    DATE_ADD(MIN(sle.posting_date), INTERVAL (4 - WEEKDAY(MIN(sle.posting_date))) DAY) AS `Week Ending`,

    SUM(CASE WHEN i.item_name LIKE '%-G-%' AND i.item_name LIKE '%24KT%' THEN sle.actual_qty ELSE 0 END) AS `Gold 24KT Qty`,
    ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN i.item_name LIKE '%-G-%' AND i.item_name LIKE '%24KT%' THEN sle.valuation_rate * sle.actual_qty ELSE 0 END) /
          NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN i.item_name LIKE '%-G-%' AND i.item_name LIKE '%24KT%' THEN sle.actual_qty ELSE 0 END), 0), 2) AS `Gold 24KT Rate`,
    ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN i.item_name LIKE '%-G-%' AND i.item_name LIKE '%24KT%' THEN sle.valuation_rate * sle.actual_qty ELSE 0 END), 2) AS `Gold 24KT Value`,

    SUM(CASE WHEN i.item_name LIKE '%-G-%' AND i.item_name LIKE '%22KT%' THEN sle.actual_qty ELSE 0 END) AS `Gold 22KT Qty`,
    ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN i.item_name LIKE '%-G-%' AND i.item_name LIKE '%22KT%' THEN sle.valuation_rate * sle.actual_qty ELSE 0 END) /
          NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN i.item_name LIKE '%-G-%' AND i.item_name LIKE '%22KT%' THEN sle.actual_qty ELSE 0 END), 0), 2) AS `Gold 22KT Rate`,
    ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN i.item_name LIKE '%-G-%' AND i.item_name LIKE '%22KT%' THEN sle.valuation_rate * sle.actual_qty ELSE 0 END), 2) AS `Gold 22KT Value`,

    SUM(CASE WHEN i.item_name LIKE '%-G-%' AND i.item_name LIKE '%18KT%' THEN sle.actual_qty ELSE 0 END) AS `Gold 18KT Qty`,
    ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN i.item_name LIKE '%-G-%' AND i.item_name LIKE '%18KT%' THEN sle.valuation_rate * sle.actual_qty ELSE 0 END) /
          NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN i.item_name LIKE '%-G-%' AND i.item_name LIKE '%18KT%' THEN sle.actual_qty ELSE 0 END), 0), 2) AS `Gold 18KT Rate`,
    ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN i.item_name LIKE '%-G-%' AND i.item_name LIKE '%18KT%' THEN sle.valuation_rate * sle.actual_qty ELSE 0 END), 2) AS `Gold 18KT Value`,

    SUM(CASE WHEN i.item_name LIKE '%-S-%' THEN sle.actual_qty ELSE 0 END) AS `Silver Qty`,
    ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN i.item_name LIKE '%-S-%' THEN sle.valuation_rate * sle.actual_qty ELSE 0 END) /
          NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN i.item_name LIKE '%-S-%' THEN sle.actual_qty ELSE 0 END), 0), 2) AS `Silver Rate`,
    ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN i.item_name LIKE '%-S-%' THEN sle.valuation_rate * sle.actual_qty ELSE 0 END), 2) AS `Silver Value`,

    ROUND(SUM(CASE 
        WHEN i.item_name LIKE '%-G-%' THEN sle.actual_qty
        WHEN i.item_name LIKE '%-S-%' THEN sle.actual_qty
        ELSE 0
    END), 3) AS `Total Qty`

FROM `tabStock Ledger Entry` sle
JOIN `tabItem` i ON sle.item_code = i.name
WHERE
    sle.posting_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 MONTH)
    AND sle.actual_qty > 0
    AND sle.is_cancelled = 0
GROUP BY
    YEAR(sle.posting_date), WEEK(sle.posting_date, 1)
ORDER BY `Week Ending`;
